title: Issues Logging In
body: I'm having a problem logging into LoL. I try and log in and am presented with an error saying that I cannot connect to the PVP.net server. I have to try, as of now, at least 5 times before I am able to successfully log in. Could someone please help me resolve this issue. Thanks

replies.body:
Hey JJ Flo!

It's actually really interesting that it works after the 5th try...hmmm....it may boil down to a connection issue where it takes a number of tries before your computer can make a consistent connection to our PvP.net Servers.

To start off with helping to troubleshoot this, make sure that you complete all of the steps in our [Login Issues KB Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues).  It should help you login more consistently on the first try!

If your still experiencing these issues, make sure to respond back to me and let me know!

I really appreciate you getting back to me in such a timely manner. However, I tried everything in the Login Issues section and none of that seemed to work. I'm not sure where the problem arose from either. Literally, nothing has changed and even after the 5.1 patch it still continues to happen. Again, I greatly appreciate the help.

If the issue is still occurring, even after the 5.1 patch, it does seem to be a connection issue to our PvP.net Servers.  Given this, make sure to try all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  

Unfortunately, there are quite a number of steps in this guide too.  Make sure to complete all of them so we can rule this out!

If you are still perpetually stuck at this screen, make sure to submit a ticket!  One of our Tech Specialists can take an in-depth look into the issue and give some more specific steps.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
it happens to me you just have to wait on patcher for a bit then try logging in :) hopefully it works for you aswell
Thank you! This actually worked for me! I don't know whether it was coincidence or not, but thank you! I still would feel better just getting it fixed though :D

Hey JJ Flo,

Also, you may want to check out the [Wrenchman's Toolbox ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sa8K7aTR-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-accountstore-issues-more)! There may be a couple of settings that are out of place that are causing this problem that can be resolved in the 'Login Issues' section of that post!
